long_description: The GoPro HERO3 camera waterproof wrist housing puts your HERO3 or HERO 3+ camera on your wrist like a watch. It pivots upright to shoot videos or photos while staying securely attached to your wrist. Perfect for surfing, snorkeling, hiking and climbing, the wrist housing makes it easy to have your HERO3 camera on hand for video and photo opportunities. Housing can also be strapped to gear such as bike handlebars, kayak paddles and the leading edge of kitesurfing kites. Adjustable neoprene strap fits a wide range of sizes-from a child's wrist to an adult's ski jacket sleeve. Waterproof to 180 ft. (60m). Note: the GoPro HERO3 camera wrist housing only fits HERO3 and HERO 3+ cameras.
short_description: The GoPro HERO3 camera waterproof wrist housing puts your HERO3 or HERO 3+ camera on your wrist like a watch. It pivots upright to shoot videos or photos while staying securely attached to your wrist.
